ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Have you really thought about what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "Have you considered what you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon, Abraham said: "Have you seen (with your eyes) those whom you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "No, but our fathers worshipped them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Do you see these – (the idols) whom you worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Do you observe that which you have been worshipping --"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Have you then considered what you have been worshipping:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'And have you considered what you have been serving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: See now that which ye worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Abraham said, "Have you really thought about what you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: have ye observed that which ye worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Have you regarded what you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Do ye then see whom ye have been worshipping,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Do you observe that which you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Have you considered what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Have you considered what you worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:75] He said, ‘Have you considered what you have been worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said: (See now that which ye worship,
